review: Now that our son finally was able to get it to work it seems to be performing pretty well.  I do find it difficult to find what I want to watch.  I still have now found a search function.My frustration initially was that it was not installing as the minimal instructions said it would and there was no tech assistance that I could find.  We are so lucky our son is sort of a tech because we would still not have it working after receiving it for Christmas.  This is the second item I have received through amazon for which there is no assistance.  Really disappointed in that aspect of Amazon.
